articles.author: Elizabeth Robinson
articles.title: Illinois stabbing survivors describe attack and Evan Gershkovich detained for a year: Morning Rundown - NBC News
articles.description: Illinois stabbing spree leaves four dead. Protests interrupt Biden fundraiser. Russian actors spread Princess Kate conspiracies. 8-year-old survives South Africa bus crash that killed 45.
articles.content: An Illinois mother credits her son and dog with saving her life during a stabbing spree that left four people dead. Two former presidents and dozens of protesters attend Joe Bidens fundraiser. And sh… [+8973 chars]

articles.author: Amy Cassidy, Sarah Dean
articles.title: South Africa bus crash kills 45 people - CNN
articles.description: Dozens of worshipers died after a bus headed to an Easter conference crashed in South Africa’s Limpopo province on Thursday, the latest tragedy in a country where recent road accidents have led to multiple casualties.

articles.title: US CDC alerts healthcare providers of increase in meningococcal disease - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: An infection with this strain had disproportionately affected people aged 30-60 years, African American people, and people with HIV, the agency said, urging healthcare providers to have a "heightened suspicion" for meningococcal disease among these population…
